package.name: VeInteractive_VePlatform
package.summary: The only automated marketing solution to solve your abandonment & conversion problems at every stage in the customer’s journey.
package.description:
We believe data can change the way people buy and sell online.
We’re leading this shift by developing intuitive onsite tools that are powered by big data.
These tools: • Make converting customers easier for small online businesses • Improve the onsite customer experience • Give the eCommerce manager control to run their own campaigns
The Problem: The rise in website abandonment and cart abandonment means that businesses lose up to 70% of potential sales.
Not only that, 3 out of 4 potential customers who place your products in their basket will then abandon.
How does Ve solve this? • Engages with users who are about to leave the site • Retargets lost customers and bringing them back to your site • Increases your website’s revenue • Improves your customer’s experience onsite
Benefits of Ve:
• Turn passive visitors into customers – engage with visitors on your site and once they’ve left • Easy to use – simple setup, maintenance and transparent pricing model (pay on performance – you only pay when customers convert) • Data-driven solutions – our insights into customer behaviour help us deliver the right message at the right time • Centralised brand management & customisable campaigns – upload your logo and font for brand consistency, change copy & messaging to suit the campaign. • Will grow with your business – take advantage of enhanced and new features as your business grows • Comprehensive FAQs – take advantage of our expertise with best practice guides and helpful tips
How to get started in 3 simple steps:
1. Download our module and then follow our easy online tutorial to add a small piece of javascript (JS) to your website.
2. Set up an account to access our optimisation and reporting platform. Follow the steps to create your first campaign and map your website (sounds a lot more complicated than it is…)
3. You go live!
Change your LinkedIn job title to “Performance Marketeer”, sit back and watch the money roll in.
Pricing:
• Ve’s re-engagement solutions are currently on a CPA basis (you pay a % of the sales Ve generates for you)
• Our display advertising solution is currently on a CPA and CPM basis, priced to suit your goals – please contact us for more information: hello@veinteractive.com
Download Ve, and you’ll join 10,000+ happy clients internationally, some of them you may have heard of Barclays Bank, Lloyds Bank, Audi, Microsoft, Topman, Argos, Karen Millen, Toys R Us, The Economist, Thomas Cook, Liverpool FC.
